title: Pacific Island life: fishing
creator_credit: Hermann Schlenker and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Examines aspects of life in the Pacific Islands. Shows the men preparing for the catch by trapping small fish in the lagoon which they then take beyond the coral reef at the mouth of the channel and use as bait to attract the larger bait. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
